title: cafter
author: cafter
content: 1. hello, i recently started this thread here i list all giveaways and contests which are live now and i update this thread every 24 hours, if any new opportunity to win is posted in "games and rounds" or "services" board then i will update thread fast as possible. link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5448924.02. is crypto is very cold in india nowadays?

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Good to hear from you, crafter! Thanks for notifying us about the new thread. Although it is kind of easy to find contests and giveaways, the thread created by you would be an added advantage for members like me and will be helpful to those who are new to the forum.Everyone is kinda busy with filing tax returns I guess. The Indian exchanges are struggling with low volumes as many users have shifted to international exchanges. On the trading and holding part Indians are in the top 5 in holding cryptocurrency globally and second in buying meme coins.Do stay active on the local board if possible.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on June 16, 2023, 08:41:04 AM2. is crypto is very cold in india nowadays?What do you mean cold on the Indian local board or cold in India? If you are pointing about the board then wait till the next halving and you will find your answer. I you are pointing India then yes, it is cold, and we are freezing in this hot weather.

comments.author: teosanru
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on June 16, 2023, 08:41:04 AM2. is crypto is very cold in india nowadays?Yep. Too cold. I remember how it was talk of town back in 2021-22 times when it was at it's peak. People were even holding seminars around it and claiming that you can become ultra rich by investing into shitcoins. After the bear run and eventually huge tax burdens by government crypto is really cold now and people have once again started to think about this as a scam.

comments.author: cafter
comments.created_time: June 22, 2023, 04:28:37 AMLast edit: August 03, 2023, 01:50:00 PM by cafter
comments.body: too many new events are live, latest updated for this week don't miss any of earning(winning) opportunity : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5448924.0 .
